name: toneclone
title: ToneClone
description:
Write with AI without sounding like AI. Write with AI using your unique voice and style with a model trained on your writing.

To get started, you'll need a ToneClone API key from https://app.toneclone.ai/api-keys
author: jfox

commands.title: Write with ToneClone
commands.subtitle: Write in your unique voice and style with your custom AI Persona
commands.description: Use ToneClone to write text for you in your unique voice and style. Write with AI without sounding like AI.

commands.title: Write with Browser Tab Context
commands.subtitle: Write with ToneClone using active browser tab as additional context
commands.description: Use ToneClone to write text based on your active browser tab content, with domain-specific persona memory.

commands.description: Train your writing persona using the content from your active browser tab
